page.title: 10ELMDON TRADING ESTATE
page.content: INTERNATIONAL HOUSE IS BUILT AS LUXURY OFFICES.IT IS THREE FLOORS HIGH.PUEGOUT TALBOT CARS RENT THE BUILDING AS THEIR HEADQUARTERS FOR U.K SALE.YOU CAN SEE FROM THE TOP FLOOR THE AIRPORT,N.E.C., STATION,FIELDS AND THE WOODS,ALSO THE REST OF THE ESTATE. THEY ARE LUXURY OFFICES.THEY COVER 61,000 SQUARE FEET. THE BUILDING WAS CONSTRUCTED SO THAT IT WOULD EASLY BE CONVERTED INTO A HOTEL SHOULD OFFICES PROVE DIFFICULT TO LET.THERE WERE TWO RECEPTION AREAS SO THAT THE BUILDING COULD BE SPLIT INTO A DUAL PURPOSE BLOCK IF NECASSARY.IT WAS A VERY NEAT AND TIDY SITE. PHIEONIX BIARD WERE IN CHARGE OF THE LETTING AND BRYANT SAMUAL DEVELOPED THE SITE.THE SITE IS BUILT SO IT DOES NOT INTERFERE WITH RESIDENTIAL AREAS.
